Package edu.wpi.disco.lang

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Propose
    Builtin semantics for proposals in Disco.xml
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Accept
    Builtin utterance for accepting a proposal.
    Ask
    Builtin semantics for utterances in Disco.xml Ask = Propose.Should(Propose...)
    Ask.Global
    Ask.Global
    Ask.How
    Ask.How = Propose.Should(Propose.How(NestedGoal...)) - utterance to ask for decomposition choice
    Ask.Nested
    Base class for Ask with nested task.
    Ask.Should
    Ask.Should = Propose.Should(Propose.Should(NestedGoal...)) - utterance to ask about optional step
    Ask.Should.Repeat
    Ask.Should.Repeat - version of Ask.Should for second and subsequent instances of repeated step
    Ask.What
    Ask.What = Propose.Should(Propose.What(NestedGoal...)) - utterance to ask for slot value
    Ask.Which
    Ask.Which = Propose.Should(Propose.Which(NestedGoal...)) - utterance to provide choices for value of slot TODO Nuance working on
    Ask.Who
    Ask.Who = Propose.Should(Propose.Who(NestedGoal...)) - utterance to ask who should perform primitive task
    Nested
    Base class for Propose.Nested and Reject, both of which take nested Task
    Ok
    Builtin utterance for acknowledgement (see Disco.xml)
    Propose.Achieved
    Propose.Achieved(Task...) - declare task to have been successfully achieved
    Propose.Global
    Utterance for proposing the value of a global JavaScript variable
    Propose.How
    Propose.How(Plan...) - utterance to choose decomposition
    Propose.Interpret  
    Propose.Nested
    Base class for proposals that have a nested task argument.
    Propose.Should
    Propose.Should(Task...) - utterance to initiate execution of specified task.
    Propose.Should.Repeat  
    Propose.ShouldNot
    Propose.ShouldNot(Task...) - utterance to reject unstarted task.
    Propose.Stop
    Propose.Stop(Task...) - utterance to stop execution of started task.
    Propose.What
    Propose.What(Task...) - utterance to provide value for slot.
    Propose.Which
    Propose.Which(Task...) - utterance to provide choices for value of slot.
    Propose.Who
    Propose.Who(Task) - utterance to propose whether agent or system should execute this primitive task
    Reject
    Builtin utterance for rejecting a proposal.
    Respond
    Base class for responding to a proposal (see Accept and Reject).
    Say
    Builtin utterance with no semantics (see Disco.xml)
    Say.Agent  
    Say.Eval  
    Say.Expression  
    Say.Expression.Eval  
    Say.User  
    TTSay
    Builtin primitive action for representing TTSay menu presentation (see Disco.xml) Only can be performed by system.
    Utterance
    Base class for utterances.
